text: Beryllium oxide, also called beryllia, is a chemical compound made of beryllium and oxygen. It has the chemical formula . It is a refractory ceramic, and the third major use of beryllium after the pure metal and beryllium alloys.IARC Working Group on the Evaluation of Carcinogenic Risks to Humans. Available from: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK304379/ It can also be an intermediate in the production of beryllium metal or its alloys. == Production == Beryllium oxide can be produced by thermolysis of beryllium sulfate. == Sources == Category:Oxides Category:Beryllium compounds
